message: I'm being fair, but I need most of the money to get started. Let's get this game going!
Alice, let's be realistic.  I'm offering you a generous amount considering the inflation. Take it while you can still get something substantial!
Okay, I'm getting serious now.  This is a much fairer split.  Let's get this done before we lose even more money!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a good deal - take it before the inflation eats away even more of your share!
This is my final offer. We can either both get a good share, or risk losing everything.  Let's be reasonable!
